sqlMap.insert:
select SEQ_LOG_XH.nextval as logXh from dual
insert into XT_LOG_LOGIN(LOG_XH,XTYHFL_DM,CZY_DJXH,DLSJ,IP,MAC,SESSION_ID,SERVERIP,SERVERPORT,QTXX) values(#logXh:NUMERIC#,#xtyhflDm:VARCHAR#,#czyDjXh:VARCHAR#,to_date(#dlsj:DATE#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #ip:VARCHAR#,#mac:VARCHAR#,#sessionId:VARCHAR#,#serverip:VARCHAR#,#serverport:VARCHAR#,#qtxx:VARCHAR#)
